extendedInfo.description: All joking aside, this time you will understand how electronic circuits work."I stumbled upon some serious gold" - GeekBeat.tv"This app takes design to a whole new level of interactivity" - Design NewsBuild any circuit, tap play button, and watch dynamic voltage, current, and charge animations. This gives you insight into circuit operation like no equation does. While simulation is running, adjust circuit parameters with analog knob, and the circuit responds to your actions in real time. You can even generate an arbitrary input signal with your finger!That's interactivity and innovation you can't find in best SPICE tools for PC like Multisim, LTspice, OrCad or PSpice (trademarks belong to their respective owners).EveryCircuit is not just an eye candy. Under the hood it packs custom-built simulation engine optimized for interactive mobile use, serious numerical methods, and realistic device models. In short, Ohm's law, Kirchhoff's current and voltage laws, nonlinear semiconductor device equations, and all the good stuff is there.Growing library of components gives you freedom to design any analog or digital circuit from a simple voltage divider to transistor-level masterpiece.Schematic editor features automatic wire routing, and minimalistic user interface. No nonsense, less tapping, more productivity.Simplicity, innovation, and power, combined with mobility, make EveryCircuit a must-have companion for high school science and physics students, electrical engineering college students, breadboard and printed circuit board (PCB) enthusiasts, and ham radio hobbyists.Free version has limited sandbox area, but it can still impress you. If you need a larger playground, a full version is available. The full version will employ all of your imagination, and all the screen area of your tablet.Thanks to Prof. N. Maghari for technical discussions, feedback, and help with designing circuit examples.Features:+ Animations of voltage waveforms and current flows+ Animations of capacitor charges+ Analog control knob adjusts circuit parameters+ Automatic wire routing+ Oscilloscope+ Seamless DC and transient simulation+ Single play/pause button controls simulation+ Saving and loading of circuit schematic+ Mobile simulation engine built from ground-up+ Shake the phone to kick-start oscillators+ Intuitive user interface+ No AdsComponents:+ Sources, signal generators+ Controlled sources (VCVS, VCCS)+ Resistors, capacitors, inductors, transformers+ Potentiometer, lamp+ Switches, SPST, SPDT+ Diodes, Zener diodes, light emitting diodes (LED)+ MOS transistors (MOSFET)+ Bipolar junction transistors (BJT)+ Ideal operational amplifier (opamp)+ Digital logic gates, AND, OR, NOT, NAND, NOR, XOR, XNORNext:+ More componentsIf you like it, please rate, review, and buy!

reviews.title: Best simulator ever
reviews.comment: Absolutely amazing. Without it I couldn\'t understand my circuit labs !!! A must have for students. Any time and literally anywhere you can build a circuit and just see how it flow as if it was real.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply Fabulous
reviews.comment: Well worth the price.  Application functions well and has room for many future enhancements - like time varying input source. I like that I can build a transistor amplifier and adjust part parameters to get what I need.  This app needs an online forum!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: This is a good app. I just wish you could make the build area as big as you want. It wouldnt change the logic and you can already zoom in and out.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Anderson

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This is an amazing app.. to make it even better i would make the build area growing as your circuit grows, disable component movement when the simulation is running and of course add more components..
reviews.author: teo zikic

reviews.title: Awsome fun easy to use tool
reviews.comment: Awsome tool for visualizing how circuits work,  easy to manipulate and adjust components to see what happens and to find good stable limits and limitations
reviews.author: alan connelly

reviews.title: Highly recommended as a learning tool
reviews.comment: I\'m currently using this alongside with my \"make: electronics\" book by oreilly and 200 in 1 radioshack electronics learning lab designed by Forrest mims III, I\'m learning electronics on my own and this tool comes in handy to help be visualize what\'s going on my simple circuits.  Its missing some components but each update gets better.
reviews.author: olaf borgstrom

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This is one of the most impressive apps I\'ve seen on the market. Intuitive GUI and great features.
reviews.author: Ryan Sivek

reviews.title: Will rate 5stars if added to
reviews.comment: I really like the app: So I paid for full version. Very neat and Creative,I would like to be able to use clock on my own circuits. I would suggest adding some more components( dual gate MosFETS , relays. fuses, multi pin transformers, possible pin Setup for circuit cards, maybe some test points, allow for enlarged working Surface, let work with other circuits On other pages, allow forlabelling Components ie R one R two R 3,,Very nice app though . I really look forward to the updates
reviews.author: Olin Overlease

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Where was this when i went through school. This is amazing and worth every penny.    But!  The transformers  don\'t work correctly. Please fix the transfers.
reviews.author: Keary Dosier

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Fantastic app one of the best I have paid for and I don\'t part with money lightly, I use to simulate circuits before I buy components to make sure that curcuit will function the way I intended  Best used on a tab though on my phone runs fine but screen is too small
reviews.author: Geoffrey Styche

reviews.title: Great Multisim App
reviews.comment: Great app. Very intuitive and easy to use. I use this to do my electronics technology labs and it has gotten me an A on everyone. It also has increased my circuit understanding exponentially. Would like to see a LARGER sandbox still. The paid version is nice but still not big enough for those super complex and larger circuits. Love the update with new circuits but if we could get a few more components and sample circuits that would be cool.
reviews.author: chad turina

reviews.title: Gift to all electronic techs, hobbyists, and engineers!
reviews.comment: I needed a low pass filter for my car subwoofer. I could make one, and substitute parts, until I got it right. Then build the project. This would have taken days or even weeks. With this app I\'ve got my love pass filter complete in 10 minutes. Now I just have to put together and enjoy it. Thank you, Igor!!!
reviews.author: Paul Baio

reviews.title: UPDATE: Works as expected
reviews.comment: Even though this app needs a bit more work (would be nice for that to explain why the circuit topology should be checked), but still it is accurate as well. I have been playing with IGBT-based inverter with capacitor-diode cascade voltage multiplier - works as expected. (P.S. Even though Everycircuit doesn\'t have IGBT, it\'s easy to make a virtual IGBT - connect MOSFET and bipolar transistor as a darlington transistor array.)
reviews.author: Donovan Lavinder

reviews.title: Build area too small to be useful
reviews.comment: I design amps and pedals. I was really excited to put one of my fuzz circuits into every circuit but the staging area only accommodates one gain stage before I run out of space. If this had an infinite stage it would be great, but as is it`s too limited to be useful.
reviews.author: Alex Launi

reviews.title: Very nice app
reviews.comment: Would be nice to have more updates and maybe the option to have white background for printing.
reviews.author: Sigur\303\260ur Har\303\260arson

reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.comment: I started on my phone with the demo. When I got my tablet I paid for the full app. I love it! I can\'t wait for more stuff though. Keep up the awesome work.
reviews.author: Pete Sebert

reviews.title: Welcome 2 the FUTURE!
reviews.comment: After a few weeks of working with EveryCircuit I finally realize why it is designed the wait it is--ITS FOR LEARNING!  Now having ample time and experience under my belt I am more than glad I held-on with EveryCircuit I come to realize just how powerful this little app is & I FINALLY get it.  I emailed Igor with my apologies and he was more than helpful & personal.  I came into this with the wrong idea, however I am leaving with much much more. I WILL be buying this on OS X & Windows come Release!!  . :thee
reviews.author: thee aldeen

reviews.title: Excellent circuit simulator!
reviews.comment: As a hobbyist I have tried many circuit simulators on both Android and Windows OS. I like EveryCircuit the best, no question. It is easiest to use, very affordable by comparison to many, and doesn\'t require an EE understanding of unfamiliar things like \"netlists\" to make it work. Also the tech support is fast and friendly!
reviews.author: Lawrence Gill

reviews.title: Nice but one caveat....
reviews.comment: I\342\200\231m really loving and enjoying this app, but there\342\200\231s just one limitation that\342\200\231s driving me nuts: the absolute insistance on a grounding point, regardless of whether or not the circuit is closed to the source. Tends to make oscillator and rectifiersimulations (colpitts, for example) very frustrating.
reviews.author: Isaac Vega
